ComicInfo.Summary:
The daily trials of Ivan at his office, recollections of previous employment, and observations about his colleagues.

A guy with a vagina for a face
Joey's mum is a penis
An unfortunate accident

Homo traps
Grandpa is a pervert

Timmy needs the car
Everyone dumps on Joe
Jiminy is a one-trade man
The Doctor cocks-up
Group therapy
A strange dream
A body full of vaginas
Menstrual problems with dicks
The Captain is disappointed with his video
The Captain is boasting
Draper is constipated
